title: Council Decision of 23 February 1998 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 23 February 1998 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture (98/C 69/04)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Mrs Carole VEYRAT is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Education and Training in the field of Architecture in place of Mr Michel REBUT-SARDA for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 25 February 1999.
attachments:
Done in Brussels, 23 February 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. COOK
(1) OJ L 223, 21.8.1985, p. 26.
(2) OJ C 76, 11.3.1997, p. 5.
